GondianWorker05.synopsis: One liners for Gondian Worker05 (Bala Ofran) after the player has visited the Iron Throne and has begun to liberate the gnomes in the Steel Foundry.
GondianWorker05.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AOpen debug bookSet flag for haivng saved prisonersGo to -1937; 0; 443Kill enemeisdisarm all kill switches that join combatClick on Bala Ofran

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN.synopsis: A talk with Toobin, Gondian leader after the Iron Throne.He asks the player to go to the lowest floor of the Foundry and destroy the Control Centre.
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Ause the debugbook>Set quest flags & options > Act3(LOW/END) > LOW - Steel Watch Foundry > choose any optionTeleport to -267; 6; -148 and go throught he dialog that startsUse Killcombat to end the fight.Start the dialog by clicking on S_LOW_GondianWorker08_Leader_3607ec31-f939-41aa-a7d2-e32f8c46979d

GondianWorker08_Leader.synopsis: Toobin asks for the player's help to save the Gondian families and free them from serving the Banites.
GondianWorker08_Leader.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to -318; 6; -163kill the baneites.the dialog will automaticall start at the end of combat.

AD_BaneiteGossip02.synopsis: Two baneites are chatting about Gortash in the Foundry. Abiflores has a massive crush on gortash.
AD_BaneiteGossip02.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to 222; 16; 324 and obeserve them from a distance

Dead_DeadGondian.synopsis: The player speaks with a dead gondian who was beaten to death by Banites for knowing too much.
Dead_DeadGondian.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to -1947; -2; 410cast speak with dead on S_LOW_DeadGondian_41a7f5e2-c2d2-4fce-9fbb-4d534993e0b3

GondianWorker06.synopsis: One liners for Gondian Worker06 (Genshu Ofran) after the player has visited the Iron Throne and has begun to liberate the gnomes in the Steel Foundry.
GondianWorker06.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AOpen debug bookSet flag for haivng saved prisonersGo to -1937; 0; 443Kill enemeisdisarm all kill switches that join combatClick on Genshu Ofran

AD_GondianWorker05_CombatRevolution.synopsis: Combat AD for Gondian Bala Ofran, when fighting in the revolution of the Steel Watch Foundry. He's scared but determined to fight back.

AD_GondianWorker05_Celebration.synopsis: Celebration AD for Gondian Bala Ofran after surviving combat in the Foundry revolution. Shocked her survived, but delighted. Relieved.

Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader.synopsis: Speak with Dead dialog with Toobin. He can reveal the password to destroy the Foundry.
Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to -325; 6; -153CTRL+shift+K on Zanner Toobinuse a different character to cast speak with dead on him

AD_ToobinLabComment.synopsis: Toobin remarks on the Lab room when he enters it as your follower.
AD_ToobinLabComment.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aopen ReCon and use "oe low_Foundry_FundangoFollower"turn on peace modeGo to -1982; -1; 420observe the AD play

PAD_OperatingTableZombieComment.synopsis: The player examines the beheaded zombie on the operating table in the foundry.

GondianWorker09.synopsis: One liner for Gondian Worker09 (Grindo Biggs) for after saving the Gondians. He is angry at the player for not arriving sooner to save him and the others.
GondianWorker09.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AOpen debug bookSet flag for haivng saved prisonersGo to -1937; 0; 443Kill enemeisdisarm all kill switches that join combatClick on Grindo Biggs

Dead_GondianWorker04.synopsis: Speak with Dead dialog for Gondian Artificer Mich'Lichen
Dead_GondianWorker04.how_to_trigger: Go to -1952; -4; 390 in CTY_Main_A, and Ctrl+shift+K on S_LOW_GondianWorker04_6cc09c40-6b09-4e92-ad36-4e5ad72f7c43Cast speak with dead on him

AD_GondianWorker04_CombatRevolution.synopsis: Combat AD for Gondian Manser Biggs, when fighting in the revolution of the Steel Watch Foundry.

AD_ToobinZombieComment.synopsis: Toobin provides some information on the Zombie area of the lab floor of the Foundry. He's passing comment on things as him and the player run past them
AD_ToobinZombieComment.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aopen ReCon and use "oe low_Foundry_FundangoFollower"turn on peace modeGo to-1937; 0; 443observe the AD play

AD_ZombieCrate.synopsis: Narrator item dialog for a crate with a zombie in it.
AD_ZombieCrate.how_to_trigger: Go to -1937; 0; 443 in CTY_Main_A and click on S_LOW_CrateNote_47f53af6-65b1-482b-9b09-7b4563d781b4

AD_BaneiteGossip.synopsis: Two guards discussing a servant of Umberlee, a waveservant, who was killed by the submersible on the way to the prison. Cold. Cruel.
AD_BaneiteGossip.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to -1941; -2; 383start sneakingsneak towards the storage room (following the bloodstains)the guards will start the AD after the other AD (between the gondain and the other guard in the room)

AD_GondianWorker09Begs.synopsis: Grindo is working on extracting the brain from a zombie cadaver. It is difficult work that requires precision. The Banite near him is firing questions at him, and it's taking Grindo everything he can not to punch him.
AD_GondianWorker09Begs.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aopen recon and turn on PeaceGo to-1937; 0; 443observe the nearby characters ADing

AD_ToobinDoorComment.synopsis: Toobin remarks on the door leading to the control centre floor.
AD_ToobinDoorComment.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aopen ReCon and use "oe low_Foundry_FundangoFollower"turn on peace modeGo to -1962; -6; 459observe the AD play

AD_GondianWorker04_Celebration.synopsis: Celebration AD for Gondian Manser Biggs after surviving combat in the Foundry revolution. Relieved.

AD_BaneiteGossip03.synopsis: The Baneite leader talks to himself while patrolling. He is quietly repeating lord Gortash's words back to himself, almost like a chant. He is zealous and utterly devoted to Lord gortash.
AD_BaneiteGossip03.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Ago to 222; 16; 324observe the Baneite talking to himself

PAD_WatcherZombieComment.synopsis: The player examines a work-in-progress Steel Watcher and reacts to the fact that there is a beheaded zombie in it.

AD_GondianWorker10_Celebration.synopsis: Celebration AD for Gondian Clore Falson after surviving combat in the Foundry revolution. Shocked she's alive, a little dissapointed.

AD_GondianWorker10_CombatRevolution.synopsis: Combat AD for Gondian Clore Falson, when fighting in the revolution of the Steel Watch Foundry. She's freaking out in combat but still fighting.

GondianWorker10.synopsis: One liner for Gondian Worker10 (Clore Falson) for after saving the Gondians. She is deeply traumatised and thinks the player isn't real.
GondianWorker10.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AOpen debug bookSet flag for haivng saved prisonersGo to -1937; 0; 443Kill enemeisdisarm all kill switches that join combatClick on Clore Falson

AlarmDoor.synopsis: The player faces a trapped door, that can only be safely opened using the right key. Other interactions result in an alarm.
AlarmDoor.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Astart game in any safe locationEnter stealthTeleport to -1962; -6; 459Sneakily approach door and interact with S_LOW_DoorToControlCentre_cc6552ec-c827-4708-bc18-9fe54b96a507

AD_BaneiteTaunt.synopsis: Baneite Guard is mocking Manser about the death of his husband (an overseer forced him to beat his own husband to death).
AD_BaneiteTaunt.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to -1941; -2; 383start sneakingsneak towards the storage room (following the bloodstains)The AD will start

GondianWorker04.synopsis: One liner for Gondian Worker04, Manser Biggs, after the player has visited the Iron Throne and has begun to liberate the gnomes in the Steel Foundry.
GondianWorker04.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AOpen debug bookSet flag for haivng saved prisonersGo to -1937; 0; 443Kill enemeisdisarm all kill switches that join combatClick on Old Mich'Lichen

AD_BaneiteOfficer10_CombatRevolution.synopsis: Combat AD for Black Gauntlet Hahns Rives, when fighting against the revolution of the Steel Watch Foundry.

AD_ZombieExamine.synopsis: This occurs when you click on one of the zombie's heads in the steel foundry - their brains are removed and a prarasite inserted into them so they can be used to control the steel watch.

AD_BaneiteOfficer06_CombatRevolution.synopsis: Combat AD for Fist of Bane Anouk, when fighting against the revolution of the Steel Watch Foundry.

AD_BaneiteGossip04.synopsis: Two Baneites chat about the pains of working in the foundry.
AD_BaneiteGossip04.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aturn on peace modego to 222; 16; 324observe the ADs

GondianWorker05_0.speaker: Gondian Bala Ofran
GondianWorker05_0.text: We heard trouble was coming - glad to see I could lend a hand.
GondianWorker05_0.context: NodeContext: after a fight, exhilirated, fought back against her captors (trouble is the player in this case)

GondianWorker05_1.speaker: Gondian Bala Ofran
GondianWorker05_1.text: The Control Centre is straight on through. You can't miss it.
GondianWorker05_1.context: NodeContext: gesturing in front of her vaguely (as she could be facing any direction)

GondianWorker05_2.speaker: Gondian Bala Ofran
GondianWorker05_2.text: Blessed Gond, I thought no one was coming for us. Thank you!

GondianWorker05_3.speaker: Gondian Bala Ofran
GondianWorker05_3.text: Don't let these bastards hurt anyone else.
GondianWorker05_3.context: NodeContext: after a fight, exhilirated, fought back against her captors

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_4.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_4.text: I cannot follow you - not with what lies ahead. End it, and I shall join you.
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_4.context: NodeContext: clearly very disturbed and kinda freaked out

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_13.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_13.text: We need to move - the Neurocitor lies in the depths of the Foundry.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_16.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_16.text: It is time - let us bring down the Foundry, and the Steel Watch with it.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_20.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_20.text: The Neurocitor. I can hear its hum - familiar, yet painful.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_26.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_26.text: I helped design the Steel Watchers, toiled night and day on the first bipedal prototype. It is fitting it ends this way.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_7.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_7.text: I will bring down not only the Steel Watch - but the very Foundry itself. This place will be smoke and rubble when I am finished. Are you ready, my friend?

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_1.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_1.text: What are you going to do?

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_42.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_42.text: Like the Foundry, the Neurocitor's exterior is near impossible to penetrate. However, its inner circuitry is highly unstable. I'm going to rain fire upon it - from the inside out.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_17.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_17.text: Gond - let your hammer be my courage, your furnace my heart.
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_17.context: CinematicNodeContext: begins typing (shot form behind) - we see a shot of something spark.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_34.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_34.text: Be swift - we've been lucky so far. I don't wish to push Gond's favour any further.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_30.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_30.text: What happened to Obelia? Is she safe?
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_30.context: NodeContext: panicked (trying and failing to be calm)

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_36.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_36.text: Blow this place to the Nine Hells, my friend - end this nightmare.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_37.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_37.text: Did you see what happened? Is my little girl - is Obelia safe?

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_32.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_32.text: My heart - I thought her lost. I would give more than just my sight to keep her safe.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_43.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_43.text: You did the impossible, so it is only fair I return the favour. The Steel Watch must be destroyed - and I will help you do it.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_22.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_22.text: Our destination is the Neurocitor - the nerve centre of the Steel Watch. Guide me there, and I'll do the rest.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_25.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_25.text: I don't need you. I have a runepowder bomb. Won't that do the trick?

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_9.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_9.text: Blessed Gond, where did you - never mind. I will go to my grave happier not knowing.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_23.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_23.text: Your bomb will most certainly do the trick. Place it directly on the Neurocitor - and then run like every fiend of the Nine Hells snaps at your heels.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_10.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_10.text: My fellow Gondians! Flee this prison. We're bringing this place down.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_28.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_28.text: I'll deal with them - when the time is right.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_8.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_8.text: This is hardly the time for errands. Do as you wish, but then we must go.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_29.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_29.text: Our destination is the Neurocitor - the nerve centre of the Steel Watch. Guide me there, and I'll do the rest.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_3.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_3.text: Increased heartbeat, audible tremble - you're lying.
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_3.context: NodeContext: cocks head to one side with a feeling of dread

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_45.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_45.text: This was all a ploy, wasn't it? To fool us into having hope? I can't believe I trusted you -monster.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_41.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_41.text: I'm sorry - she didn't make it.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_18.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_18.text: I put my trust, my faith, in you - for nothing?

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_46.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_46.text: You mean you were there, yet you did nothing?!

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_27.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_27.text: The prison exploded, but I got everyone out.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_5.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_5.text: Some hostages died, but your daughter wasn't one of them.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_19.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_19.text: Short, annoying, doesn't shut up about Gond? Yeah, she survived.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_38.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_38.text: We are losing time. You must guide me to the Neurocitor, before the Banites send reinforcements.

GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_39.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_AfterIRN_39.text: Lead the way - I'll listen to your steps and bring up the rear.

GondianWorker08_Leader_9.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_9.context: NodeContext: Narn'guth kree'shav da'lor. (naan-guff kree'shuv dah-lore) 'you don't belong here'

GondianWorker08_Leader_105.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_105.text: Your nervous gait betrays your presence, stranger. You don't belong here. Who are you?

GondianWorker08_Leader_119.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_119.text: I've come to free you - I already dealt with some of the Banites.

GondianWorker08_Leader_93.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_93.text: Your presence imperils us all. If any of us attempts to escape, our kin will die.

GondianWorker08_Leader_72.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_72.text: The overseers - they have a contraption. When triggered, it will kill everyone who wears a collar.
GondianWorker08_Leader_72.context: NodeContext: gesturing at his own neck

GondianWorker08_Leader_88.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_88.text: You underestimate the enemy. The overseers, they are glix'bran rak'tharr.

GondianWorker08_Leader_17.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_17.text: The collars are not only equipped with explosives, there is also a mechanism that alerts the overseers if they're removed.

GondianWorker08_Leader_40.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_40.text: One of us may be able to save themselves, but it would be at the expense of everyone else. We can't risk it.
GondianWorker08_Leader_40.context: NodeContext: shaking head, feeling lost, frustrated

GondianWorker08_Leader_47.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_47.text: Rise up in unison - they can't stop you all.

GondianWorker08_Leader_46.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_46.text: Even if we did somehow unshackle our collars simultaneously, and overthrow our oppressors, there would be consequences.

GondianWorker08_Leader_36.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_36.text: Our families are held elsewhere. The overseers need only activate those contraptions they hold, and they suffer the consequences of our actions too.

GondianWorker08_Leader_0.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_0.text: We cannot win. We must aid in building these vargh'kron.
GondianWorker08_Leader_0.context: NodeContext: varg-KRON (damnation). feeling lost, hopeless, angry

GondianWorker08_Leader_35.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_35.text: There's always a way. Will you fight back if I free your families?

GondianWorker08_Leader_65.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_65.text: Gond'kul, aye!  Even more  - I'd help you destroy this place.
GondianWorker08_Leader_65.context: NodeContext: GOND-cull (by Gond), shocked, surprised, hopeful. Player has offered to help

GondianWorker08_Leader_107.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_107.text: Where are your families being held?

GondianWorker08_Leader_56.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_56.text: I don't know where they are. But some of the overseers must - you'll have to infiltrate deeper into the Foundry.

GondianWorker08_Leader_95.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_95.text: Just make sure you don't get caught. If they raise the alarm, they'll trigger the collars.

GondianWorker08_Leader_28.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_28.text: I will pray for you. My daughter...her name is Obelia.
GondianWorker08_Leader_28.context: NodeContext: love in his voice at the mention of his daughter

GondianWorker08_Leader_83.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_83.text: Gond'ral thra'kazhul nesh. May Gond be with you.
GondianWorker08_Leader_83.context: NodeContext: Gond-rahl FRA-kazz-hool nesh. (may Gond be with you). Knows he's putting immense trust in the player.

GondianWorker08_Leader_14.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_14.text: The destruction I can handle. I have a runepowder bomb.

GondianWorker08_Leader_48.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_48.context: NodeContext: surprised, thought player was an ally but now fears they've been led astray by wulbren

GondianWorker08_Leader_97.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_97.text: Look - Wulbren is no friend of the Gondians. He's a piece of frenk'vol. I don't know what poison he put in your mind, but we are good people in a bad place.
GondianWorker08_Leader_97.context: NodeContext: frenk (friend with a 'k' instead of a 'd') VOL (shit). Determined to show player that wulbren is bad news (wulrebn really is)

GondianWorker08_Leader_96.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_96.text: Help us and I promise we'll help you. You won't need something as drastic as runepowder to bring this place down. I know a way.

GondianWorker08_Leader_2.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_2.text: All right, I'll help. Where are your families?

GondianWorker08_Leader_113.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_113.text: Sorry, but I need to stop the Steel Watch now.

GondianWorker08_Leader_115.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_115.text: How do you intend to help me?

GondianWorker08_Leader_15.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_15.text: I created the Neurocitor that controls the Steel Watch, and I made sure I had a means to disable it if I ever had the freedom to do so.

GondianWorker08_Leader_38.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_38.text: Get me close enough to the central mechanism, and I can shut down the whole foundry. But first, our families must be safe.

GondianWorker08_Leader_62.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_62.text: The Steel Watchers are tools of oppression - building them makes you complicit with the oppressors.

GondianWorker08_Leader_33.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_33.text: Don't you think I know that? We're no cowards. We talked about revolting. We know what these Watchers are for.

GondianWorker08_Leader_70.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_70.text: But my daughter is among those they took away. I've no choice. And neither do the others.

GondianWorker08_Leader_26.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_26.text: It's selfish to value your families more than an entire city.

GondianWorker08_Leader_39.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_39.text: Maybe. But it would be unnatural to feel otherwise.

GondianWorker08_Leader_123.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_123.text: I need to destroy the Steel Watch. Are you going to help me or not?

GondianWorker08_Leader_64.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_64.text: I know this place better than anyone - better than the Gondians even. I could help you destroy it, if I knew our families were safe.

GondianWorker08_Leader_116.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_116.text: All right, I'll help. Where are your families?

GondianWorker08_Leader_57.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_57.text: I have a runepowder bomb, and I intend to destroy this facility with it, no matter the cost.

GondianWorker08_Leader_89.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_89.text: It's worth the risk - worst case scenario, you die fighting.

GondianWorker08_Leader_84.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_84.text: If it were only our lives on the line, we'd have rebelled long ago.

GondianWorker08_Leader_90.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_90.text: If everyone who wears a collar is helping to build the Steel Watch, killing you all may be a good thing.

GondianWorker08_Leader_12.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_12.text: A grim solution, but one that I may agree with if your understanding of the situation were correct.

GondianWorker08_Leader_32.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_32.text: Unfortunately, we are not the only ones threatened by the collars, or we would have laid down our tools, and rebelled against our oppressors already.

GondianWorker08_Leader_29.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_29.text: Before any of them can press a button in the palm of their hands? You may be quick, but nobody is that quick.

GondianWorker08_Leader_63.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_63.text: I'm [GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53] - I'm here to take down the Steel Watch.

GondianWorker08_Leader_4.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_4.text: Who I am doesn't matter - I'm here to destroy the Foundry.

GondianWorker08_Leader_86.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_86.text: If I tell you, won't you go running to the guards?

GondianWorker08_Leader_124.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_124.text: To the tyrants who collared me like a dog and took my daughter? No - I think not.

GondianWorker08_Leader_6.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_6.text: But I do have to inform them. Your very presence here imperils us all.

GondianWorker08_Leader_19.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_19.text: I'm here for entertainment - and it's been quite the show so far.

GondianWorker08_Leader_117.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_117.text: If you knew the truth, you would not mock us so.

GondianWorker08_Leader_22.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_22.text: Tharr'dakz. Fargh'nul kreth'nar da'droth. My daughter. Sweet Obelia, what have they done to you?
GondianWorker08_Leader_22.context: NodeContext: Far-DACKS. Farg-NULL kreff-narr DAH-droff.   (Those aresholes. They killed my family)

GondianWorker08_Leader_112.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_112.text: The Banites. They collared us like dogs, locked our families away - promised us freedom if we followed their every command.

GondianWorker08_Leader_120.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_120.text: Take a deep breath - I'm here to help.

GondianWorker08_Leader_92.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_92.text: It's too late. The Banites collared us like dogs, locked our families away - promised us freedom if we followed their every command.

GondianWorker08_Leader_60.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_60.text: But it was a lie. They used a Motivator, probably laughed as collars activated - burning my friends, my family, from the inside out.

GondianWorker08_Leader_81.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_81.text: All except me. Gond must have intervened - but why save me? Why is my life worth more than my daughter's?

GondianWorker08_Leader_102.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_102.text: Perhaps the god of invention has a plan for you?

GondianWorker08_Leader_118.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_118.text: You're right - Gond saved me for a reason.

GondianWorker08_Leader_77.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_77.text: I don't think a 'god' saved you. Maybe it just malfunctioned?

GondianWorker08_Leader_23.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_23.text: Believe me or don't - I care not. But Gond kept me alive for a reason.

GondianWorker08_Leader_108.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_108.text: If I cannot be my fellow Gondians' saviour - then I shall be their avenger.

GondianWorker08_Leader_18.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_18.text: The Steel Watch needs to be destroyed, and the Foundry along with it.

GondianWorker08_Leader_78.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_78.text: I have a runepowder bomb. I just need a target.

GondianWorker08_Leader_25.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_25.text: Runepowder? Gond's hammer, where did you find such a thing?

GondianWorker08_Leader_114.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_114.text: Follow me to the neurocitor. I will show you how to overload it, and to shut down the Steel Watch forever.

GondianWorker08_Leader_74.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_74.text: My fellow Gondians are likely already dead. Cut down any Banites you see - they've earned their fate.

GondianWorker08_Leader_109.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_109.text: This is nothing to do with me.

GondianWorker08_Leader_94.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_94.text: I'm here to end the Steel Watch - and that means any Gondians, too.

GondianWorker08_Leader_51.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_51.text: The Steel Watch must be destroyed, and the Foundry with it.

GondianWorker08_Leader_87.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_87.text: I'm in - just tell me how.

GondianWorker08_Leader_5.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_5.text: The Foundry was built to withstand the power of a hundred Wild Magic sorcerers.

GondianWorker08_Leader_54.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_54.text: In its depths, however, lies the Neurocitor - the nerve centre of the Steel Watch.

GondianWorker08_Leader_34.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_34.text: Take me to it. I will disable the Steel Watch - and end this perversion of Gondian ideals.

GondianWorker08_Leader_20.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_20.text: Hold here a moment. I'll be back.

GondianWorker08_Leader_13.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_13.text: Come. Let's take this place down.

GondianWorker08_Leader_49.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_49.text: Gond, light the path and grant us your wisdom.

GondianWorker08_Leader_8.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_8.text: Yes! Let's make these bastards suffer.

GondianWorker08_Leader_66.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_66.text: With what I have planned, they will do more than suffer.

GondianWorker08_Leader_98.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_98.text: I don't need freedom. I want vengeance.

GondianWorker08_Leader_11.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_11.text: I don't have time for this - die already.

GondianWorker08_Leader_27.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_27.text: Have you found them - our families?

GondianWorker08_Leader_122.speaker: Player
GondianWorker08_Leader_122.text: I think they're being held underwater.

GondianWorker08_Leader_91.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_91.text: The Banites must have a way of getting to and from the prison. I suggest you search the docks.

GondianWorker08_Leader_21.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_21.text: Keep searching. We must find them - please.

GondianWorker08_Leader_45.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_45.text: We need to move. The Neurocitor lies in the depths of the Foundry - and I have no doubt more than Banites await us.

GondianWorker08_Leader_68.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_68.text: Leave, I beg of you. A Motivator is all that stands between my daughter and an agonising death.

GondianWorker08_Leader_71.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_71.text: There is little time - take me to the Neurocitor.

GondianWorker08_Leader_79.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_79.text: You've tormented me enough - leave me.

GondianWorker08_Leader_82.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_82.text: I warned you - I warned you of the consequences, yet you had to interfere!

GondianWorker08_Leader_101.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_101.text: My daughter is dead, they're all dead - because of you!

GondianWorker08_Leader_104.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_104.text: I thought you were the cure - our salvation. I had hope.

GondianWorker08_Leader_75.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
GondianWorker08_Leader_75.text: The Overseers must have used a Motivator. Bastards probably laughed as collars activated - burning my friends, my family, from the inside out.

AD_BaneiteGossip02_0.speaker: Fist of Bane Aminah
AD_BaneiteGossip02_0.text: It's been an age since Gortash's last visit.
AD_BaneiteGossip02_0.context: NodeContext: a bit sad, wishing she could see the big boss (has a crush on him

AD_BaneiteGossip02_2.speaker: Fist of Bane Polandulus
AD_BaneiteGossip02_2.text: Lord Gortash - you have not earned such familiarity.

AD_BaneiteGossip02_1.speaker: Fist of Bane Aminah
AD_BaneiteGossip02_1.text: Forgive me, Dread Brother. I simply... wish to look upon Bane's Chosen once more.
AD_BaneiteGossip02_1.context: NodeContext: mortified, trying to hide that she was fangirling

AD_BaneiteGossip02_6.speaker: Fist of Bane Aminah
AD_BaneiteGossip02_6.text: I heard the Black Hand's favoured can command the room with a single word. And that he knows no fear.

AD_BaneiteGossip02_5.speaker: Fist of Bane Polandulus
AD_BaneiteGossip02_5.text: Instead of sharing idle gossip about Lord Gortash, I suggest you focus on your duties.

AD_BaneiteGossip02_8.speaker: Fist of Bane Aminah
AD_BaneiteGossip02_8.text: Have you ever spoken to him?
AD_BaneiteGossip02_8.context: NodeContext: earnest (speaking about her crush, lord gortash)

AD_BaneiteGossip02_4.speaker: Fist of Bane Polandulus
AD_BaneiteGossip02_4.text: Lord Gortash? Only once. I felt the Black Hand's power in every word.

AD_BaneiteGossip02_9.speaker: Fist of Bane Aminah
AD_BaneiteGossip02_9.text: To speak to him, face-to-face? The very thought sends chills up my spine.

AD_BaneiteGossip02_7.speaker: Fist of Bane Polandulus
AD_BaneiteGossip02_7.text: You are a long way from such an honour.
AD_BaneiteGossip02_7.context: NodeContext: kind of rolling his eyes

Dead_DeadGondian_16.speaker: Narrator
Dead_DeadGondian_16.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

Dead_DeadGondian_19.speaker: Gondian Lanpos Biggs
Dead_DeadGondian_19.text: Banites came... took over the Foundry... forced us to make... the Steel Watchers...

Dead_DeadGondian_21.speaker: Gondian Lanpos Biggs
Dead_DeadGondian_21.text: The Banites had my husband beat me... for eavesdropping...

Dead_DeadGondian_14.speaker: Gondian Lanpos Biggs
Dead_DeadGondian_14.text: The prison... the Iron Throne... it's underwater. Submersible... under warehouse... docks...

Dead_DeadGondian_1.speaker: Player
Dead_DeadGondian_1.text: How do I disable the Steel Watch?

Dead_DeadGondian_4.speaker: Player
Dead_DeadGondian_4.text: How many guards are in the building?

Dead_DeadGondian_3.speaker: Narrator
Dead_DeadGondian_3.text: *The corpse remains silent. It does not know.*

Dead_DeadGondian_20.speaker: Narrator
Dead_DeadGondian_20.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

Dead_DeadGondian_22.speaker: Narrator
Dead_DeadGondian_22.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

GondianWorker06_1.speaker: Gondian Genshu Ofran
GondianWorker06_1.text: I won't let any Banites pass me - I swear it.

GondianWorker06_2.speaker: Gondian Genshu Ofran
GondianWorker06_2.text: I was hoping for an army of Flaming Fist, but I'm not complaining. Keep going - there's more up ahead!

GondianWorker06_3.speaker: Gondian Genshu Ofran
GondianWorker06_3.text: I'll watch your back - go on!

GondianWorker06_4.speaker: Gondian Genshu Ofran
GondianWorker06_4.text: You took down the Iron Throne, didn't you? Did you see my sister?

GondianWorker06_0.speaker: Gondian Genshu Ofran
GondianWorker06_0.text: Never mind - there'll be time for that later. Keep going - we'll watch your back.
GondianWorker06_0.context: NodeContext: pulls himself back, trying to be practical but scared for his sister.

Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_16.speaker: Narrator
Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_16.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_4.speaker: Player
Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_4.text: How do I destroy the Steel Watch?

Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_3.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_3.text: Go the Neurocitor... in the depths of the Foundry... Input code 'Nebelun'... then increase to maximum output...

Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_15.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_15.text: Zanner Toobin... leader of the... Gondians...

Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_19.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_19.text: The Banites came... collared us... took our families... forced us to build... the Steel Watchers...

Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_21.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_21.text: I did... to my eternal shame...

Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_0.speaker: Player
Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_0.text: Where are your families being held?

Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_1.speaker: Player
Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_1.text: Once I input code 'Nebelun' into the Neurocitor, what do I do?

Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_20.speaker: Narrator
Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_20.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_22.speaker: Narrator
Dead_GondianWorker08_Leader_22.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

AD_ToobinLabComment_0.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
AD_ToobinLabComment_0.text: This is the Foundry's main lab. The horrors we made here will haunt me to the grave.

PAD_OperatingTableZombieComment_0.speaker: Player
PAD_OperatingTableZombieComment_0.text: A cadaver with the brain removed. Is this how they puppet the Steel Watch?

GondianWorker09_0.speaker: Gondian Grindo Biggs
GondianWorker09_0.text: About time someone showed up. Did we finally reach your 'dead gondian' quota? Is that why it took so long for anyone to help us?
GondianWorker09_0.context: NodeContext: He's grateful to be alive but also feels guilty he's survived when so many haven't. Bitter, angry, grieving

GondianWorker09_2.speaker: Gondian Grindo Biggs
GondianWorker09_2.text: Are you a hero or a useless bum? Move.
GondianWorker09_2.context: NodeContext: He's grateful to be alive but also feels guilty he's survived when so many haven't. Bitter, angry, grieving

GondianWorker09_3.speaker: Gondian Grindo Biggs
GondianWorker09_3.text: If you're waiting for thanks, you'll get none from me. Go help the others, go on!
GondianWorker09_3.context: NodeContext: He's grateful to be alive but also feels guilty he's survived when so many haven't. Bitter, angry, grieving

Dead_GondianWorker04_17.speaker: Narrator
Dead_GondianWorker04_17.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

Dead_GondianWorker04_16.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
Dead_GondianWorker04_16.text: Manser Biggs... husband of Lanpos... father to Grindo and Hastar...

Dead_GondianWorker04_14.speaker: Player
Dead_GondianWorker04_14.text: What do you do in the Foundry?

Dead_GondianWorker04_20.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
Dead_GondianWorker04_20.text: Used to prep brains for... parasitic insertion. Now I... create optic relays...

Dead_GondianWorker04_15.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
Dead_GondianWorker04_15.text: The Banites collared us... forced us to build the Steel Watchers... made me... made me...

Dead_GondianWorker04_1.speaker: Player
Dead_GondianWorker04_1.text: What did the Banites make you do?

Dead_GondianWorker04_6.speaker: Player
Dead_GondianWorker04_6.text: Why did they make you kill your husband?

Dead_GondianWorker04_4.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
Dead_GondianWorker04_4.text: Because he found out where... they're holding our sons... captive...

Dead_GondianWorker04_3.speaker: Narrator
Dead_GondianWorker04_3.text: *The corpse remains silent. It does not know.*

Dead_GondianWorker04_21.speaker: Narrator
Dead_GondianWorker04_21.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

Dead_GondianWorker04_22.speaker: Narrator
Dead_GondianWorker04_22.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

AD_GondianWorker04_CombatRevolution_0.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
AD_GondianWorker04_CombatRevolution_0.text: This old man still has some fight in him!

AD_GondianWorker04_CombatRevolution_3.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
AD_GondianWorker04_CombatRevolution_3.text: I'll take every one of you bastards down.

AD_ToobinZombieComment_1.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
AD_ToobinZombieComment_1.text: I smell death and decay. We're near cadaver preparation, aren't we?

AD_ToobinZombieComment_0.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
AD_ToobinZombieComment_0.text: Poor bastards are shipped in from all over the Realms. Most come from a fellow called Balthazar by way of Moonrise Towers.

AD_ZombieCrate_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ZombieCrate_0.text: *The inscription reads: 'Fresh supplies for the Steel Watch, courtesy of Necromancer Balthazar'.*

AD_BaneiteGossip_8.speaker: Fist of Bane Frode
AD_BaneiteGossip_8.text: Something is on your mind, Dread Sister - speak.

AD_BaneiteGossip_4.speaker: Fist of Bane Gudrun
AD_BaneiteGossip_4.text: The body of the dead waveservant. Has it been located?

AD_BaneiteGossip_3.speaker: Fist of Bane Frode
AD_BaneiteGossip_3.text: It is lost - why do you ask?

AD_BaneiteGossip_1.speaker: Fist of Bane Gudrun
AD_BaneiteGossip_1.text: If it is found, it could pose a risk to our operations.

AD_BaneiteGossip_7.speaker: Fist of Bane Frode
AD_BaneiteGossip_7.text: Such thoughts are above your station - focus on your tenets, Dread Sister.

AD_BaneiteGossip_10.speaker: Fist of Bane Gudrun
AD_BaneiteGossip_10.text: Dread Brother, is it true the transport hit and killed someone?

AD_BaneiteGossip_9.speaker: Fist of Bane Frode
AD_BaneiteGossip_9.text: It was only a waveservant - a minor inconvenience.

AD_BaneiteGossip_0.speaker: Fist of Bane Gudrun
AD_BaneiteGossip_0.text: You do not fear they will retaliate?

AD_BaneiteGossip_6.speaker: Fist of Bane Frode
AD_BaneiteGossip_6.text: If they do, we will deal with them in a manner befitting the Black Hand.

AD_BaneiteGossip_11.speaker: Fist of Bane Gudrun
AD_BaneiteGossip_11.text: You were fortunate to work shifts on the prison transport, were you not, Dread Brother?

AD_BaneiteGossip_5.speaker: Fist of Bane Frode
AD_BaneiteGossip_5.text: Indeed. The trip took my breath away.

AD_BaneiteGossip_12.speaker: Fist of Bane Gudrun
AD_BaneiteGossip_12.text: I've not had the pleasure of seeing the prison with my own eyes.

AD_BaneiteGossip_2.speaker: Fist of Bane Frode
AD_BaneiteGossip_2.text: Your time will come. Only Lord Gortash's most trusted may guard the Iron Throne.

AD_GondianWorker09Begs_4.speaker: Gondian Grindo Biggs
AD_GondianWorker09Begs_4.text: Really? You don't know how your own Steel Watchers operate?
AD_GondianWorker09Begs_4.context: NodeContext: Angry, losing his temper for just a second - but it's enough

AD_GondianWorker09Begs_12.speaker: Black Gauntlet Borri Paver
AD_GondianWorker09Begs_12.text: One finger. Another word, and it'll be your left eye.

AD_GondianWorker09Begs_0.speaker: Gondian Grindo Biggs
AD_GondianWorker09Begs_0.text: Forgive me. The brains have a parasite inserted into their frontal lobes.
AD_GondianWorker09Begs_0.context: NodeContext: scared, wind taken out of his sails, afraid

AD_GondianWorker09Begs_10.speaker: Gondian Grindo Biggs
AD_GondianWorker09Begs_10.text: We preserve them in an embalming solution for longevity.

AD_GondianWorker09Begs_3.speaker: Gondian Grindo Biggs
AD_GondianWorker09Begs_3.text: This is not helping me work quicker.
AD_GondianWorker09Begs_3.context: NodeContext: Angry, nervous - desperately wants to punch the banite in the face but can't

AD_GondianWorker09Begs_9.speaker: Black Gauntlet Borri Paver
AD_GondianWorker09Begs_9.text: I'm going to be merciful and pretend I didn't hear that tone.

AD_GondianWorker09Begs_11.speaker: Black Gauntlet Borri Paver
AD_GondianWorker09Begs_11.text: Tell me - what are you doing?

AD_GondianWorker09Begs_7.speaker: Gondian Grindo Biggs
AD_GondianWorker09Begs_7.text: Is this some kind of test?

AD_GondianWorker09Begs_8.speaker: Black Gauntlet Borri Paver
AD_GondianWorker09Begs_8.text: It's whatever I damn well want it to be. Keep going.

AD_GondianWorker09Begs_13.speaker: Gondian Grindo Biggs
AD_GondianWorker09Begs_13.text: The parasite's psionic connection to the hivemind is what enables remote control of its Watcher.

AD_GondianWorker09Begs_1.speaker: Black Gauntlet Borri Paver
AD_GondianWorker09Begs_1.text: Correct. Now, tell me - how excited are you to dig your stubby little fingers into a corpse's brain?

AD_GondianWorker09Begs_6.speaker: Gondian Grindo Biggs
AD_GondianWorker09Begs_6.text: I am... excited. And fortunate to work on such a momentous project.

AD_ToobinDoorComment_0.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
AD_ToobinDoorComment_0.text: If I've counted my footsteps correctly, this door leads to the Foundry's depths - and the Neurocitor.

AD_BaneiteGossip03_0.speaker: Black Gauntlet Hahns Rives
AD_BaneiteGossip03_0.text: 'Oppression is the price of peace - for only a unified agenda can bring order.'

AD_BaneiteGossip03_1.speaker: Black Gauntlet Hahns Rives
AD_BaneiteGossip03_1.text: 'Free will is a poison, subjugation an art. Teach the masses the price of disobedience and they will be your enforcers.'

AD_BaneiteGossip03_2.speaker: Black Gauntlet Hahns Rives
AD_BaneiteGossip03_2.text: 'We seek a realm without conflict, without ego, without free will. We seek unity. We seek the Ultimate State.'

AD_BaneiteGossip03_3.speaker: Black Gauntlet Hahns Rives
AD_BaneiteGossip03_3.text: 'Dissenting voices are infectious - and must be routed out. Only when the Black Hand's voice speaks in silence will unity follow.'

PAD_WatcherZombieComment_0.speaker: Player
PAD_WatcherZombieComment_0.text: There's an undead inside this Watcher. Why? And where is its head?

AD_GondianWorker10_CombatRevolution_1.speaker: Gondian Clore Falson
AD_GondianWorker10_CombatRevolution_1.text: Gond has abandoned us - so I will be his HAMMER!

GondianWorker10_0.speaker: Gondian Clore Falson
GondianWorker10_0.text: The Titan will kill you. It will kill us all.
GondianWorker10_0.context: NodeContext: traumatised, out of it, almost like she's in her own world. Someone who has been hurt so badly that she's almost on another world (the titan is a huge, terrifying steel watcher in the other room - she saw it kill a number of her friends)

GondianWorker10_1.speaker: Gondian Clore Falson
GondianWorker10_1.text: The others will think you're real, but I know the truth. No one leaves the Foundry. No one defies Lord Gortash.
GondianWorker10_1.context: NodeContext: scared, not meeting players eyes, hands over face

GondianWorker10_2.speaker: Gondian Clore Falson
GondianWorker10_2.text: No - you're not here. It's a trick - an Overseer trick! But I won't fall for it - I'm a good Gondian.
GondianWorker10_2.context: NodeContext: scared, not meeting players eyes, hands over face

GondianWorker10_3.speaker: Gondian Clore Falson
GondianWorker10_3.text: The Titan - it's angry you helped me. Do you hear it? Do you feel it?
GondianWorker10_3.context: NodeContext: traumatised, out of it, almost like she's in her own world. Someone who has been hurt so badly that she's almost on another world (the titan is a huge, terrifying steel watcher in the other room - she saw it kill a number of her friends)

AlarmDoor_3.speaker: Narrator
AlarmDoor_3.text: *This sturdy door is a dizzyingly complex system of cogs and gears.*

AlarmDoor_16.speaker: Narrator
AlarmDoor_16.text: *The door and Motivators are rigged in the same way. Opening the door will set it off - with no way to deactivate it.*

AlarmDoor_21.speaker: Narrator
AlarmDoor_21.text: *As the lock clicks open, the alarm triggers - and the screaming begins.*

AlarmDoor_8.speaker: Narrator
AlarmDoor_8.text: *The lock jams as the alarm goes off - and the screaming begins.*

AlarmDoor_6.speaker: Narrator
AlarmDoor_6.text: *The door is rigged to the Foundry's alarm system. Opening it will set it off.*

AlarmDoor_14.speaker: Narrator
AlarmDoor_14.text: *Other than a deep sense of foreboding, nothing strikes you as unusual about the door.*

AlarmDoor_2.speaker: Player
AlarmDoor_2.text: Extend your magic to surround the door.

AlarmDoor_11.speaker: Narrator
AlarmDoor_11.text: *The door, and its intricate alarm system, remain.*

AD_BaneiteTaunt_1.speaker: Fist of Bane Anouk
AD_BaneiteTaunt_1.text: Your hand shakes, Gondian. Tell me, what was your friend's name?
AD_BaneiteTaunt_1.context: NodeContext: cruel, knows why Manser is upset yet still pushing it

AD_BaneiteTaunt_2.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
AD_BaneiteTaunt_2.text: My husband's name was Lanpos, ma'am.
AD_BaneiteTaunt_2.context: NodeContext: upset, trying to keep his voice steady

AD_BaneiteTaunt_4.speaker: Fist of Bane Anouk
AD_BaneiteTaunt_4.text: Lanpos deserved to die - tell me why.
AD_BaneiteTaunt_4.context: NodeContext: rubbing salt in the wound

AD_BaneiteTaunt_3.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
AD_BaneiteTaunt_3.text: My husband was eavesdropping, ma'am. He - he needed to be beaten.
AD_BaneiteTaunt_3.context: NodeContext: heratbreaking knowing he killed his own husband, barely keeping it together (for the sake of their kids)

AD_BaneiteTaunt_0.speaker: Fist of Bane Anouk
AD_BaneiteTaunt_0.context: NodeContext: cruel smile, delighting in his misery

GondianWorker04_0.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
GondianWorker04_0.text: Don't waste your time on me - keep going.
GondianWorker04_0.context: NodeContext: trying to keep it together, and failing

GondianWorker04_1.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
GondianWorker04_1.text: Gond's bollocks, I thought I was dead. Hoped I was, to be honest.
GondianWorker04_1.context: NodeContext: shaken up, thinking of his dead husband, can't believe he's alive and lanpos isn't

GondianWorker04_4.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
GondianWorker04_4.text: Why don't you go help the others? I'll rest up here.

GondianWorker04_2.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
GondianWorker04_2.text: Blow this place to the Nine Hells - you hear me?

GondianWorker04_3.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
GondianWorker04_3.text: Toobin said you were on the way - glad to see the old man is still as crafty as ever. Keep going - we've got your back.

AD_BaneiteOfficer10_CombatRevolution_0.speaker: Black Gauntlet Hahns Rives
AD_BaneiteOfficer10_CombatRevolution_0.text: Bend the knee or I will break it!

AD_BaneiteOfficer10_CombatRevolution_1.speaker: Black Gauntlet Hahns Rives
AD_BaneiteOfficer10_CombatRevolution_1.text: This is a lesson - how painful it is, is up to you.

AD_BaneiteOfficer10_CombatRevolution_2.speaker: Black Gauntlet Hahns Rives
AD_BaneiteOfficer10_CombatRevolution_2.text: You fight against progress. I will not allow it.

AD_BaneiteOfficer10_CombatRevolution_3.speaker: Black Gauntlet Hahns Rives
AD_BaneiteOfficer10_CombatRevolution_3.text: You were made to serve. Do not fight your nature.

AD_ZombieExamine_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ZombieExamine_0.text: *Surgical lines ring the undead's head - it's been prepped to have its brain removed.*

AD_BaneiteOfficer06_CombatRevolution_0.speaker: Fist of Bane Anouk
AD_BaneiteOfficer06_CombatRevolution_0.text: You are no match for the Black Hand.

AD_BaneiteOfficer06_CombatRevolution_1.speaker: Fist of Bane Anouk
AD_BaneiteOfficer06_CombatRevolution_1.text: I will make you beg for death.

AD_BaneiteOfficer06_CombatRevolution_2.speaker: Fist of Bane Anouk
AD_BaneiteOfficer06_CombatRevolution_2.text: You dare raise your hand against us?!

AD_BaneiteOfficer06_CombatRevolution_3.speaker: Fist of Bane Anouk
AD_BaneiteOfficer06_CombatRevolution_3.text: I will break you in His name!

AD_BaneiteGossip04_1.speaker: Fist of Bane Zana Hade
AD_BaneiteGossip04_1.text: How long must we patrol this wretched hole? We should be outside - spreading His word, enforcing His will!

AD_BaneiteGossip04_3.speaker: Iron Consul Underbite Yoonce
AD_BaneiteGossip04_3.text: Patience. The Gondians are pivotal to Lord Gortash's plan.
AD_BaneiteGossip04_3.context: NodeContext: a small smile, he appreciates Zana's enthusiasm

AD_BaneiteGossip04_2.speaker: Fist of Bane Zana Hade
AD_BaneiteGossip04_2.text: Aren't you sick of them? How they cower and cry at the slightest thing? It's vile.
AD_BaneiteGossip04_2.context: NodeContext: talking about the gondians. Utter loathing in her voice - they're not people to her

AD_BaneiteGossip04_0.speaker: Iron Consul Underbite Yoonce
AD_BaneiteGossip04_0.text: It is the natural order - the strong rule the weak. In time, you will grow used to their cries.
AD_BaneiteGossip04_0.context: NodeContext: a small smile, he appreciates Zana's enthusiasm

AD_BaneiteGossip04_7.speaker: Iron Consul Underbite Yoonce
AD_BaneiteGossip04_7.context: NodeContext: formal, checking in for a report

AD_BaneiteGossip04_6.speaker: Fist of Bane Zana Hade
AD_BaneiteGossip04_6.context: NodeContext: little bit petulant - she was hoping for violence

AD_BaneiteGossip04_4.speaker: Iron Consul Underbite Yoonce
AD_BaneiteGossip04_4.text: Hah - your time to prove yourself will come, Dread Sister. And I have no doubt the Black Hand will be pleased at what he sees.
AD_BaneiteGossip04_4.context: NodeContext: an appreciative laugh at the beginning. Proud of Zana.

AD_BaneiteGossip04_10.speaker: Fist of Bane Zana Hade
AD_BaneiteGossip04_10.text: How many Gondians are needed to run the Foundry?
AD_BaneiteGossip04_10.context: NodeContext: a sly smile in her voice - she has an idea (it's not a nice one)

AD_BaneiteGossip04_8.speaker: Fist of Bane Zana Hade
AD_BaneiteGossip04_8.text: I have been focusing on the tenent of subjugation - having a test subject would be very helpful.

AD_BaneiteGossip04_9.speaker: Iron Consul Underbite Yoonce
AD_BaneiteGossip04_9.text: Hm. I will speak to Black Gauntlet Holzt - perhaps she can spare one.
AD_BaneiteGossip04_9.context: NodeContext: a small smile, he appreciates Zana's enthusiasm
